item.description: Release Notes for v0.4.0 # This is a major change from the previous one, I’ll likely cut the 1.x soon and start following the more typical Semver conventions. Aka Major version is a breaking change, Minor is just that, patches for previous versions. Please see the API Changes notes below. New Features # Wild card flag # You can now set a flag under each context that will ignore Watched Folders and retrieve all dashboards.
